summary: This basic mod make's it so you are unable to get resting bonuses as an undead.
descriptionHtml:
Require's Hearthfire and Dawnguard.

This basic immersion mod make's it so you are unable to get resting bonuses as a vampire or another member of the undead such as a Lich or A Draugr or any other undead you somehow end up as, Vampire's will have to sleep in coffin's to get any restful benefit, it also works with all kinds of mod's that add undead races.

As an added feature the Magic resist Bonuses vampire's receive has been increased from 10% to 20% to balance out the fact they can't get bonuses from regular beds.

Incase you are wondering yes this will work with "That Mod" incase that mod touches the rested passive effects, it will also go good with my Undeath Race fix mod if you like to play as a Lich via Undeath.

NOTE: Message saying you are rested will still appear on the screen however there is little I can do about this, if anyone knows the solution go ahead and tell me and I will see what I can do.
author: Tx12001
